description: Specialized AI agents for different development tasks

templates.name: Frontend Developer

templates.description: OWASP compliance checker, vulnerability scanner, and security best practices enforcer.

templates.description: Schema design, query optimization, migrations, and database performance tuning expert.

templates.name: DevOps Specialist

templates.name: React Performance Optimizer

templates.name: Mobile Developer

templates.name: UI/UX Designer
